# The `VPTransformState` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vptransformstate">VPTransformState</a> holds information passed down when &quot;executing&quot; a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a>, needed for generating the output IR. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::VPTransformState</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vptransformstate">VPTransformState</a> holds information passed down when &quot;executing&quot; a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a>, needed for generating the output IR.

Definition at line 231 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.

### addMetadata() {#a4238cde7c588137b218845e15ce7cb34}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void VPTransformState::addMetadata (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; To, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; From)</>}>
Add metadata from one instruction to another.

This includes both the original MDs from <code>From</code> and additional ones (
<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="#a5797d36eb67fb263b8c111e12e9818aa">addNewMetadata</a>). <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> this <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a4cfc8b177e8521a4b496ae2edff6244f">for</a> <em>newly created</em> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7e3e687ddfdcbacd404bcf17b917dd88">instructions</a> in the <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpupromotealloca-cpp/#ac760e37eba1d852d0a28011a1a0ce05f">vector</a> loop.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h/#l00323">323</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-cpp/#l00360">360</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-cpp">VPlan.cpp</a>.

### addNewMetadata() {#a5797d36eb67fb263b8c111e12e9818aa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void VPTransformState::addNewMetadata (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; To, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Orig)</>}>
Add additional metadata to <code>To</code> that was not present on <code>Orig</code>.

Currently this is used to add the noalias annotations based on the inserted memchecks. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> this for instructions that are <em>cloned</em> into the vector loop.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h/#l00316">316</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-cpp/#l00352">352</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-cpp">VPlan.cpp</a>.

### set() {#af3ac355d8def4b4935de51a9560b44d7}

If <code>IsScalar</code> is true, set the scalar in lane 0.

### set() {#a96f61745bc423d971ad2369e9175335a}
